name: Maries County R-II School District Reviews

review.title: “Wonderful Co-Workers, Principals and Special Ed Director Unprofessional”
review.pros: Pros – The teachers, aides, and support staff are wonderful at this small school. The counselors are fantastic with the students and community. The kids and parents are amazing to work with in the Belle/Bland community
review.cons: Cons – Starting pay is horrible and the atmosphere created from principals and spec ed services outweigh the benefits of wanting to be a excellent classroom teacher.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Get rid of home town politics and favoritism and treat teachers, parents, and kids with the respect that they deserve.
